commenter_b: Blue laws are state laws or local laws that regulate in state commerce and are not the purview of the Federal Government. Few states have Blue Laws any more. In our state, only alcohol (package sales) are banned and that decision is made locally - not by the state. We have dry counties and dry townships. That decision is made by local residents.
